VaultManager.description: Main vault contract for yield aggregation

StrategyRouter.description: Routes funds between different yield strategies

SCsprStrategy.description: Strategy for sCSPR liquid staking yields

DexLpStrategy.description: Strategy for DEX liquidity provision yields

deploymentInstructions.step1: Install Casper Wallet browser extension from https://www.casperwallet.io/
deploymentInstructions.step2: Import the mnemonic phrase into Casper Wallet
deploymentInstructions.step4: Connect wallet and request 1000 CSPR tokens
